features: Clinical Strength protection to fight 3 types of sweat – stress, heat, and activity
Clinically Proven Prescription strength wetness protection
3X* Stress Sweat Protection (*vs. the wetness protection required of an ordinary antiperspirant)
body.description: Never let them see you sweat! Secret Clinical Strength Antiperspirant and Deodorant for Women is clinically proven protection for 3 types of sweat; 1) stress sweat, 2) heat sweat and 3) activity sweat. Secret Clinical Strength offers the wetness protection of a prescription-strength product formulated to be gentle on skin, making it perfect for everyday use. Secret Clinical Strength Soft Solid—advanced protection to take on even the most stressful days. Also available in invisible solid and clear gel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting, no sweating thru on clothes
reviews.reviewText: Mild scent, not detectable when wearing, keeps me dry 24/7 , no discoloration of clothing under arms, no noticeable sweating, and certainly none that shows through my clothes. The clinical strength formulas are worth every penny in savings from extra washings, stain removers, to not having to discard stained tops or excessive dry cleaning bills. Keeps me dry even under stressful situations. Couldn’t say that before I began using clinical strength formulas after a pharma rep friend said how well they worked about 16 years ago. Saved me so much over the years! Unbelievably great- all of the clinical strength versions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Odor Ninja That Saved My Social Life!
reviews.reviewText: Oh, Secret Clinical Strength Antiperspirant and Deodorant, how do I love thee? Let me count the ways... or better yet, let me share my hilarious tale of how you transformed me into the ultimate odor-fighting superhero!Picture this: It was a scorching summer day, and I had a hot date planned with my crush. I wanted to make a great impression, so I put on my best outfit, styled my hair, and even practiced my smoothest pick-up lines in the mirror. But there was one thing I couldn't control: the dreaded underarm sweat monster!Luckily, Secret Clinical Strength swooped in like a caped crusader, ready to conquer my perspiration woes. With one swipe, it unleashed its magical powers, and suddenly, I felt like I had an invisible forcefield protecting me from embarrassing sweat stains.As I walked towards my date, I couldn't help but feel like a secret agent on a mission to save the world from underarm disasters. With each step, I was confident that my armpits were staying as dry as a desert, and my confidence soared higher than a superhero leaping over tall buildings.Throughout the date, I laughed, I danced, and I even did the Macarena (don't judge me, it was a moment of pure joy). And guess what? Not a single hint of sweat dared to make an appearance. Talk about a miracle in a deodorant stick!But the real test came when we decided to have a spicy Mexican feast for dinner. I knew this was going to be a true test of Secret Clinical Strength's powers. As I devoured tacos and salsa with the enthusiasm of a hungry T-Rex, I braced myself for the potential aftermath.To my astonishment, my underarms remained cool, calm, and collected – not a whiff of unwanted odor in sight! Secret Clinical Strength had defeated the mighty smell demons, leaving me feeling like I could conquer the world, one salsa-filled bite at a time.So, my fellow sweaty comrades, if you're tired of feeling like a human sprinkler system or a walking onion, I implore you to give Secret Clinical Strength a try. It's the deodorant that turns ordinary days into epic adventures and saves you from embarrassing sweat catastrophes.With Secret Clinical Strength, you'll have the confidence to tackle anything life throws at you, from nerve-wracking dates to dance-offs with friends. So go forth, my fellow odor warriors, and let Secret Clinical Strength be your trusty sidekick in the battle against sweat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Stress Sweating
reviews.reviewText: I don’t sweat much during the normal day to day routine, but when I’m under stress I tend to sweat more. This works well and I like the smell very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have always been a deodorant freak, and this one is my go-to for someone who struggles to find a long-lasting deodorant. Other deodorants, even men's seem to give out partway through the day, but this one works well all day for me without reapplying. It's gentle on the skin and applies smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great price, long lasting, nice scent. Only complaint is the dial is hard to operate/turn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Secret Clinical Strength Antiperspirant and Deodorant for Women in the Invisible Solid formulation has become my go-to choice for reliable and long-lasting protection.What sets this antiperspirant apart is its clinical strength formula. It effectively combats perspiration, providing a high level of wetness protection even in demanding situations. The invisible solid format ensures a smooth and residue-free application, leaving no white marks on clothing.The lasting power of this deodorant is impressive, offering all-day freshness and odor control. Whether navigating a busy workday or engaging in physical activities, Secret Clinical Strength delivers consistent protection against sweat and odor.The mild and pleasant fragrance adds a subtle touch without being overpowering, making it suitable for various preferences. The gentle formula is also kind to the skin, avoiding irritation commonly associated with some clinical-strength antiperspirants.For women seeking a powerful defense against perspiration and unwanted odors, Secret Clinical Strength in the Invisible Solid form is a reliable choice. It provides peace of mind throughout the day, ensuring you stay fresh and confident. Highly recommended for those in search of clinical-strength performance with a discreet and comfortable application.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great for long time!
reviews.reviewText: I am a postpartum mom and have that funk. The deodorant I was using while pregnant I ended up becoming allergic to it when I had my baby. I went back to my pre pregnancy deodorant but they seemed to not be long lasting enough to keep the funk away all day. This smells SO good and lasts all day through the stress, sweat, and anxiety of being a new mom and keeping the whole house and family happy and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secret Clinical is a winner!
reviews.reviewText: This works so well! I like to use this some days and then other days use a less strong formula, keeps it working and lasts a little longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is honestly the best deodorant around. I’ve struggled with perspiration when wearing dove, Nivea, even Mitchum after a while - I tried this at my last resort and it is INCREDIBLE. The price seems high but a bottle lasts me at least 6 months, so you’re talking about a few pounds a month which is pretty standard. It rolls on dry - no waving your arms in the air these days and it WORKS so well, even on holiday and really hot weather. I need it forever and ever!!
Es un buen desodorante y el precio estaba mucho más abajo que en tienda física, lo recomiendo.
Llevo usando este desodorante por años ya, no lo cambio por nada. Una lástima que el precio sea tan alto.

Compre este producto ya que lo llevo usando durante varios años y nunca me había fallado, siempre huelo de maravilla, a pesar de haber aplicado el producto hace un tiempo (en la mañana). El único problema fue al comprar el paquete pude ver que la fecha de expiración del producto era el siguiente mes, o sea, en el paquete de 3, 2 iban a expirar antes de darles cualquier uso. Por otra parte, por primera vez en los 10 años que uso este desodorante me causó una reacción adversa, por lo que tuve que sustituirlos por marcas anti alérgicas.
